sub_title: Head of Treasury & Investor Relations at Q-Park
summary:
I have 15 years of experience in Banking, Debt Capital Markets, Treasury technology, Cash Management, Risk Management, Treasury Management, Cashflow forecasting, Insurance management and all other corporate treasury related activities.

Q-Park is a KKR-portfolio company. It is a market-leading mobility company with a focus on providing parking services at targeted locations in or near multifunctional inner-city areas, at public transport interchanges and at hospitals. We currently manage more than 870,000 parking spaces in over 6,300 secured parking facilities across seven Western-European countries.

school.name: TIAS School for Business and Society

education.field_of_study: Executive Master in Finance and Business Valuation
education.grade: Completion of the program with Honors (8,5/A grade)

school.name: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School

education.field_of_study: Executive program in Business Administration and Management
Working Capital Management, Risk Management, Cash Management and FX Management

profile_positions.description:
As Head of Treasury of Q-Park, I report to the CFO and interact with other functional areas of Treasury, Finance, Corporate Accounting, Tax, Payables & Receivables and (internal) Audit. 

Duties, Responsibilities and achievements

Debt Capital Markets: 
- Developing and maintaining the debt financing strategy, including obtaining and maintaining the credit rating.
- Issuance and refinancing of Q-Park's high yield bonds.
- Managing relationships with investors and rating agencies.
- Continue expanding Q-Park's strategic partnership with banks and financial institutions.
- Monitor financial covenants and ensure Q-Park is in compliance with them.

Liquidity Management
- Manage all cash management functions including cash concentration, wires, account funding. 
- Ensuring adequate liquidity for working capital needs and invest short term excess cash. 
- Manage intercompany cash, including intercompany lending, dividends, and capital injections. 
- Manage the global cashflow forecasts.
- Oversee cash management banking and financial institution relationships. 
- Negotiate bank and service fees. Implementing new banking products and services to improve cash cycle and simplify company operations. 
- Implementation of a new Treasury Management System and some other treasury applications,
- Ensure compliance with internal controls, policies and procedures. Develop and monitor treasury policies.
- Standardizing and optimizing the cashflow forecasting process  

Insurance Management
- Managing the group-wide insurance programs
- Maintaining the relationship with brokers and insurance companies
- Ensure that all policies are renewed timely

About Q-Park
Q-Park B.V. is a KKR portfolio company that operates mobility services in Europe. The company focuses on providing services related to parking  near multifunctional inner-city areas, at public transport interchanges and hospitals.  It has facilities in the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, UK, France, Ireland and Denmark.
profile_positions.title: Head of Treasury

profile_positions.description:
As a Manager in EY Advisory I managed and led teams on projects and liaised with other Advisory teams to deliver high quality client service. My main focus areas were the new payment solutions and selecting and implementing new Treasury IT structures and applications. Additionally, I advised (inter)national banks on regulatory changes (Basel III, Basel IV, CRD IV), and the impact of these changes on their product- and service offerings. 

As a team leader, I proactively coached and motivated team members towards efficiently meeting engagement goals and as a member of the management team I contributed towards managing the Industry Focus group, recruiting and training, services offerings, and other operational activities. 

To summarize, my experience and core competences lay in the following areas:

- Innovative payment solutions
- Cash- and liquidity management, including notional pooling and cash flow forecasting
- Treasury technology: TMS selection & implementation
- Treasury IT applications: optimization of the Treasury IT infrastructure
- Treasury organization and governance assessment 
- Treasury performance assessment
profile_positions.title: Manager - Treasury Advisory Services

profile_positions.description:
As a Transaction Services Consultant, I was commercially responsible for all flow/transactional banking related services such as Payments and Cash Management (including e.g. Cash Concentration/Notional Pooling, Cards acquiring, SEPA, Electronic Banking Channels) Trade Finance and Working Capital Solutions for Dutch subsidiaries of foreign based Corporate Clients and Real Estate Finance clients. 

Corporates are rarely looking for isolated products but instead for integrated solutions to their daily financing and transactional challenges. We helped our clients to optimize their working capital management by offering them excellent solution-based advice. We delivered flawless execution of liquidity, trade and payments solutions in an easy, safe, efficient and effective way.

Main responsibilities were:
- To advise the International Corporates on ING’s European Transactional landscape covering nearly 30 countries with their own specific payment types, methods and clearing houses
- To advise the international corporates on possibilities and benefits of SEPA
- Supporting and advising companies in optimizing their internal processes and compliancy regulation with regard to AP/AR processes and as a result ensuring the most efficient way of reconciliation
- Collaboration with local in-country colleagues during commercial pitches and implementation of solutions afterwards.
profile_positions.title: Senior Consultant Transaction Services Sales

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for the Payments and Cash Management structure of the Corporate Clients in the client portfolio.

During the period January 2010 till April 2012, I've worked in two different functions within the Payments and Cash Management Sales organisation, finally resulting in being responsible for my own client portfolio. 

Serving and advising a group of Corporates on their payment flows, working capital and Cash Management.

volunteer_experiences.role: Reading to and helping children to read
volunteer_experiences.description: Supporting schools in spending time to read individually or in small groups with  children. The individual attention (once a week 30-60 minutes) and the time to explain what the children read, helped them to improve their reading skills and hopefully helps them to learn and build a solid foundation for their future.
